DOC.brief_summary: Dissynergic defecation causes solitery rectal ulcer. The biofeedback therapy improves dissynegy and heals soliter rectal ulcer.
DOC.brief_title: The Biofeedback Therapy in Solitery Rectal Ulser Patients BIOFEEDBACK THERAPY
DOC.detailed_description: dyssynergia treating ulcers caused by treatment with biofeedback
DOC.criteria: solitary rectal ulcer in rectosigmoidoscopy type 1 or 3 dissynergic defecation to accept to participate to study and sign informed consent previously applied biofeedback serious psychiatric disorder previous anorectal surgery the presence of active malignancy
